speaker: Agent
utterance: Given that it’s a new and valuable car, I strongly recommend a comprehensive policy that includes Zero Depreciation cover and Insured Declared Value (IDV).

speaker: User
utterance: Why is IDV important?

speaker: Agent
utterance: IDV ensures you receive the original invoice value in the event of a total loss. In the case of a total loss, this cover guarantees that the payout will match the original purchase price of the vehicle as per the invoice, rather than the depreciated current value, providing greater financial relief.

speaker: User
